pages.text: Clay Golems can be summoned by using the Animate Golem glyph. Clay golems come in all 4 tiers of clay, with later ones having more health, damage, and immunities. Clay golems can be repaired with a clay item, but later tiers will slowly heal themselves as well. They have 4 behavior modes, which can be cycled by sneak-right clicking with a dominion wand.

The first behavior mode is COMBAT, in which they'll attack anything you do, much like a wolf. The second is GUARD, where they will follow you and attack anything that hurts you. The third is PATROL, in which they'll defend a spot from hostile mobs. The last is HUNT, in which they chase down hostile mobs anywhere nearby.
Clay golems are the perfect soldiers, as they never tire or require supplies.
